title: Machine Learning Engineer (100% remote- Germany)
description:
Join Tether and Shape the Future of Digital Finance

At Tether, we’re not just building products, we’re pioneering a global financial revolution. Our cutting-edge solutions empower businesses—from exchanges and wallets to payment processors and ATMs—to seamlessly integrate reserve-backed tokens across blockchains. By harnessing the power of blockchain technology, Tether enables you to store, send, and receive digital tokens instantly, securely, and globally, all at a fraction of the cost. Transparency is the bedrock of everything we do, ensuring trust in every transaction.

Innovate with Tether

Tether Finance: Our innovative product suite features the world’s most trusted stablecoin, USDT, relied upon by hundreds of millions worldwide, alongside pioneering digital asset tokenization services.

But that’s just the beginning:Tether Power: Driving sustainable growth, our energy solutions optimize excess power for Bitcoin mining using eco-friendly practices in state-of-the-art, geo-diverse facilities.

Tether Data: Fueling breakthroughs in AI and peer-to-peer technology, we reduce infrastructure costs and enhance global communications with cutting-edge solutions like KEET, our flagship app that redefines secure and private data sharing.

Tether Education: Democratizing access to top-tier digital learning, we empower individuals to thrive in the digital and gig economies, driving global growth and opportunity.

Tether Evolution: At the intersection of technology and human potential, we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible, crafting a future where innovation and human capabilities merge in powerful, unprecedented ways.

Why Join Us?

Our team is a global talent powerhouse, working remotely from every corner of the world. If you’re passionate about making a mark in the fintech space, this is your opportunity to collaborate with some of the brightest minds, pushing boundaries and setting new standards. We’ve grown fast, stayed lean, and secured our place as a leader in the industry.

If you have excellent English communication skills and are ready to contribute to the most innovative platform on the planet, Tether is the place for you.

Are you ready to be part of the future?

About The Job

At Tether, we are at the forefront of integrating artificial intelligence with brain-computer interface technologies. Our projects leverage deep learning, generative models, and representation learning to decode and interpret brain activity. With our foundation in both established and cutting-edge AI infrastructure, our mission is to bridge the gap between AI and neuroimaging, driving innovation that’s not only revolutionary but also accessible, transparent, and privacy-focused.

We are looking for a motivated and skilled machine learning engineer to join our dynamic Brain & AI team. This role focuses on developing AI models that enhance our understanding of neural mechanisms and apply this knowledge to real-world applications. You will be instrumental in pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in AI and neuroscience, helping to solve some of the most complex and fascinating challenges in the field today.

Responsibilities:


 * Develop and evaluate scalable deep learning algorithms that are central to our brain decoding initiatives.
 * Collaborate closely with data scientists to pioneer research in generative modeling and representation learning.
 * Identify bottlenecks in data processing pipelines and devise effective solutions, improving performance and reliability.
 * Maintain high standards of code quality, organization, and automatization across all projects.
 * Adapt machine learning and neural network algorithms to optimize performance in various computing environments, including distributed clusters and GPUs.
   
   

Basic Qualifications:


 * Strong programming skills in Python, with experience in developing machine learning algorithms or infrastructure using Python and PyTorch.
 * Experience in deep learning techniques such as supervised, semi-supervised, self-supervised learning, and/or generative modeling.
 * Proficient in managing unstructured datasets with strong analytic skills.
 * Demonstrated project management and organizational skills.
 * Proven ability to support and collaborate with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.
   
   

Preferred Qualifications:


 * Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems, or another quantitative field.
 * Familiarity with deep learning libraries such as Huggingface, Transformers, Accelerator and Diffuser.
 * Hands-on experience in training and fine-tuning generative models like diffusion models or large language models such as GPTs and LLAMAs.
 * Experience with data and model visualization tools.

title: Software-Test-Engineer (m/w/d)
description:
2017 als Spin-off einer großen familiengeführten Unternehmensgruppe gegründet, ist KARMA die innovative Gebäude-Digitalisierungslösung im B2B Bereich. KARMA unterstützt Unternehmen entscheidend dabei, die Effizienz im Gebäudebetrieb zu steigern, Kosten zu senken und einen aktiven Beitrag zur Senkung des weltweiten CO2-Ausstoßes zu leisten. KARMA verknüpft damit die zwei zukunftsträchtigsten Bereiche „Digitalisierung“ und „Klimaschutz“. Unser Ziel ist kein geringeres als KARMA zur führenden Plattform für nachhaltiges Gebäudemanagement zu entwickeln!

Und dafür brauchen wir Dich!

Du bist technikaffin und kannst Kunden von einem Produkt begeistern? Du bist ein Macher-Typ und hast Lust gemeinsam mit uns KARMA zum Erfolg zu führen? Du liebst Geschwindigkeit anstelle von Richtlinien und vordefinierten Prozessen

Deine Rolle

Als Software-Test-Engineer bei KARMA bist Du verantwortlich für die Planung, Entwicklung und Implementierung von Teststrategien, um die Qualität unserer Softwareprodukte sicherzustellen. Du wirst eng mit dem Entwickler- und dem Produktteam zusammenarbeiten, um sicherzustellen, dass unsere Lösungen fehlerfrei und benutzerfreundlich sind.


 * Entwickeln und implementieren von detaillierten Testplänen und Testfällen
 * Durchführung von manuellen und automatisierten Tests zur Sicherstellung der Softwarequalität
 * Zusammenarbeit mit dem Entwicklerteam zur Identifikation von Fehlern und Problemen in der Software
 * Verwendung von Bug-Tracking-Tools zur Dokumentation und Nachverfolgung von Fehlern
 * Durchführung von Regressionstests und anderen Testarten je nach Projektbedarf
 * Aktive Teilnahme an Sprint-Planungen und Review-Meetings
 * Weiterentwicklung der Testautomatisierung und Verbesserung bestehender Testprozesse
   
   

Anforderungen


 * Bachelor-Abschluss in Informatik, Ingenieurwesen oder einem verwandten Fachbereich
 * Mindestens 2 Jahre Erfahrung in der Softwaretestung, vorzugsweise in einem agilen Entwicklungsumfeld
 * Starke Kenntnisse in Testautomatisierungstools wie Selenium, JUnit, TestNG
 * Erfahrung mit Versionskontrollsystemen, vorzugsweise Git
 * Fähigkeit, sowohl unabhängig als auch als Teil eines Teams zu arbeiten
 * Fließende Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift
   
   

Worauf kannst du dich freuen?


 * Alle Vorteile eines Start-ups kombiniert mit der langfristigen Sicherheit durch eine familiengeführte Unternehmensgruppe als Inhabergesellschaft mit knapp 1 Mrd. Jahresumsatz
 * Vielfältige Herausforderungen, Flexibilität und Freiraum für eigene Ideen - Auf Wunsch jederzeit Mitwirkungen bei Sonderprojekten und an der Weiterentwicklung unseres Unternehmens
 * Hohe Investition in deine persönliche Weiterentwicklung (Intern und Extern), sowie Möglichkeiten sukzessive in den Aufgabenbereichen mehr Verantwortung zu übernehmen
 * Flexibilität und die Möglichkeit mobil zu arbeiten
 * Modernste Arbeitsumgebung inkl. neuester IT und internen Softwareanwendungen
 * Modernes Büro mit Dachterrasse, Grill und unmittelbar an der S-Bahn Station Ludwigsburg
 * Eine offene Unternehmenskultur mit flachen Hierarchien, zügigen Entscheidungswegen, Teamspirit und Hands-on Mentalität
   
   

BEWIRB DICH JETZT

Passt schon mal? Dann möchten wir Dich jetzt kennenlernen!

Wir möchten Dich so kennenlernen, wie du bist und dich wohlfühlst. Deswegen gibt es bei uns auch beim Bewerbungsgespräch keinen Dresscode.

Wir freuen uns auf Deine Bewerbung als "Software-Test-Engineer (w/m/d)". Über den Button "Online Bewerbung" kannst du Dich mit nur wenigen "Klicks" deine Bewerbungsunterlagen (knackiges Anschreiben, deinen Lebenslauf und relevante Arbeitszeugnisse) einreichen.

title: Software Engineer (all genders)
description:
Your mission

As a Software Engineer, you’ll work across both frontend and backend to help us deliver a seamless, user-friendly experience. You’ll collaborate with our engineers to build and improve PartsOS, ensuring a smooth integration between systems and frontend interfaces. If you’ve got a knack for solving tough challenges with elegant, scalable solutions, we want to hear from you!

What You’ll Be Working On


 * Backend Brilliance: Build and maintain backend services using Python (Django). Shape our API architecture to power the frontend and seamlessly connect with external systems.
 * Frontend Mastery: Craft responsive, user-friendly single-page apps with Vue.js. Write clean, maintainable TypeScript code while collaborating with the frontend team to ensure stack-wide consistency.
 * Data Management: Extend the core data model and manage data in Postgresql.
 * Seamless Integration: Ensure smooth collaboration between frontend and backend by developing and documenting RESTful APIs.
 * CI/CD & Testing: Contribute to the CI/CD pipeline, deploying backend services and frontend updates effortlessly. Write and maintain unit and integration tests to guarantee reliability across systems.
   
   

Who We’re Looking For


 * Fullstack Pro: You’re skilled in both frontend (Vue.js, React, or Angular) and backend (Python/Django). You’ve shipped production apps and know how to build polished, scalable software.
 * API & Database Expert: You’ve built REST APIs and worked with PostgreSQL (or a similar database).
 * Frontend Advocate: You’re comfortable working on the frontend when needed, ensuring our users have a smooth, engaging experience.
 * CI/CD Contributor: You’ve worked in environments with CI/CD pipelines, ensuring smooth and reliable deployments.
 * Good Communicator: You are a strong communicator and fluent in English. German is a plus, but not required.
 * Work Eligibility: You are located in Europe and hold all the necessary work authorizations for your country.
   
   

Why You’ll Love This Role


 * Remote Flexibility: Work from anywhere in Europe with the freedom to set your own hours. We focus on results, not where or when you work, giving you full control over your work-life balance.
 * Epic Team Events: Get ready for unforgettable team-building experiences! From 5-day retreats — sometimes even abroad — to regular virtual hangouts, we prioritize fun, collaboration, and celebrating our successes together.
 * Own Your Impact: As a Software Engineer, you'll shape key parts of our product—your code and decisions will directly influence our growth!
 * Build the Future: Develop and scale PartsOS, playing a crucial role in revolutionizing the spare parts industry with your technical expertise.
 * Startup Energy: Thrive in a dynamic environment, continuously learning and tackling fresh challenges as we grow together!
   
   

The Tools You’ll Be Using


 * Python & Django: You’ll be working with these tools to build our backend services and APIs.
 * Vue.js: You’ll contribute to the frontend, using Vue to create responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
 * PostgreSQL: You’ll design and maintain database structures, ensuring data is efficiently stored and accessible.
 * TypeScript: You’ll write and maintain TypeScript code across both frontend and backend.
   
   

Is This You?

An adaptable fullstack developer with solid experience in both backend and frontend technologies, always looking to deepen your knowledge across the stack. You're confident in TypeScript and know its value for writing maintainable, robust code. Skilled in creating reliable backend services, you're also ready to dive into new problem-solving challenges daily.

Not Quite Your Thing?

We’re after engineers who are comfortable across the full stack. If your passion lies solely in frontend or backend, this might not be a perfect match. Also, a heads-up — Vue.js is part of the mix here, so being open to that is essential.

Ready to Be Part of Something Big?

This is the perfect role for a Fullstack Software Engineer who loves solving complex problems and wants to make a real impact in a growing startup. If you’re passionate about creating seamless, scalable systems and enjoy working across the full stack, we’d love to chat! We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for everyone.

Send your application to grow@partscloud.de and let’s start building something incredible together!

About Us

At PartsCloud, we’re revolutionizing the way service and spare parts teams operate with our innovative cloud-based software, PartsOS. Designed to seamlessly integrate with all major ERP systems, PartsOS simplifies inventory management and fulfillment for industrial spare parts, even those with unpredictable demand.

Our advanced AI and machine learning capabilities allow businesses to accurately forecast future needs, reducing excess inventory while ensuring parts are readily available. With an integrated process library tailored for industrial spare parts, we help teams implement state-of-the-art fulfillment standards worldwide without the burden of costly infrastructure.

PartsOS serves as a co-pilot for data-driven decision-making, featuring user-friendly dashboards that provide essential insights for efficient operations. Say goodbye to manual inventory management & fulfillment — our solution automates processes, making spare parts management easier than ever.

Join us at PartsCloud and be part of a future-proof solution that keeps businesses competitive in a rapidly changing market!

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
Capgemini Global Insights & Data business line is a market leader in the data, platform, and analytics across all regions and across many sectors (including financial services, consumer products, manufacturing & life sciences). Our offerings include end-2-end data integration to cloud platform, complete suite of AI engineering capabilities and a category of sector-based advanced analytics / AI solutions.



The places that you work from day to day will vary according to your role, your needs, and those of the business; it will be a blend of Company offices, client sites, and your home; noting that you will be unable to work at home 100% of the time.




Your Role



We are seeking an experienced and visionary Machine Learning Engineer to lead our data-driven decision-making processes. This role requires someone with a balance of analytical skills, strategic foresight, and the ability to collaborate effectively across diverse teams. The Machine Learning Engineer will be instrumental in designing and implementing data strategies that enhance business growth, optimize operations, and foster an inclusive environment of innovation.



 * Analytical Thinking & Problem-Solving: Proven ability to dissect complex problems and provide actionable insights in a timely manner.
 * Strategic Mindset: Experience developing and executing strategies that are both long-term and adaptable to changing business landscapes.
 * Collaboration & Communication: Strong interpersonal skills, with an emphasis on listening, empathy, and the ability to translate complex data concepts into understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders.
 * Leadership & Mentorship: Ability to lead with compassion and clarity, fostering a supportive team environment that values collaboration and diverse perspectives.



Your Skills and Experience



 * Design, develop and implement both cutting-edge and well-established machine learning methods for content analysis, data retrieval, content classification, and others with a focus on NLP and LLM-related applications
 * Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools
 * Develop machine learning applications according to requirements
 * Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks
 * Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results
 * Select appropriate datasets and data representation method
 * Ability to write robust code in Python, Java and R
 * Excellent communication skills
 * you will need to be fluent in German language (C1 level)



Why you should consider Capgemini



Growing clients’ businesses while building a more sustainable, more inclusive future is a tough ask. When you join Capgemini, you’ll join a thriving company and become part of a diverse collective of free-thinkers, entrepreneurs and industry experts. We find new ways technology can help us reimagine what’s possible. It’s why, together, we seek out opportunities that will transform the world’s leading businesses, and it’s how you’ll gain the experiences and connections you need to shape your future. By learning from each other every day, sharing knowledge, and always pushing yourself to do better, you’ll build the skills you want. You’ll use your skills to help our clients leverage technology to innovate and grow their business. So, it might not always be easy, but making the world a better place rarely is.



About Capgemini



Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.

#GetTheFutureYouWant| www.capgemini.com

title: Flight Test Specialist Engineer - Electric Propulsion System (m/f/d)
description:
Company Description

Here at Volocopter, we are the pioneers of electric air taxis (electric vertical takeoff and landing aircraft - eVTOLs). We have pledged to bring sustainable urban air mobility to life by getting electric air taxis off the ground in a way that complements existing transportation options in megacities across the globe. In 2011 we carried out the first-ever crewed flight of a fully electric multicopter and have since conducted more than 2,000 public and private test flights across the world (www.volocopter.com).

Job Description

Your mission during this flight:

You will be a member of our Flight Test Team, providing technical and operational expertise in Electric Propulsion Systems, (EPS) for Ground and Flight tests of crewed and uncrewed configurations. Tests will usually be conducted locally, (Bruchsal/Lahr) but may involve campaigns at remote locations from time to time.

You will work closely with our engineering and EPS rig testing teams to assist our flight testing process and to ensure the required readiness for test in time, on cost and quality. In addition, you will manage activities related to the aircraft DMU. As a Senior FTSE, you will be a mentor to more junior engineers, and have opportunities for technical guidance. Volocopter has an established Flight Test Organization as part of our EASA Part21J Design Organization Approval (DOA).


 * You are involved with planning, monitoring, and optimizing Ground and Flight Test activities for electric aircraft development and certification purposes on your specialities (EPS) for the overall functions of a complete aircraft
 * You assist withaircraft preparation, inspection, and repair pre/post-test
 * You take care of the mechanical integration of FTI systems into the aircraft and coordination of interfaces with affected systems
 * You are involved in the assessment and documentation of tests including troubleshooting and development of standardized analysis and reporting tools
 * You work on engineering projects, the solution of which requires technological advances and related development
   
   

Qualifications

Check in your professional skills:


 * Master’s degree in Aeronautical Engineering or equivalent technical education
 * 15+ years of experience as an Engineer involved in aeronautical development and certification process
 * Experience in electric propulsion systems
 * Experience in planning, monitoring and examining propulsion systems testing
 * Experience in Siemens NX or other CAD design and query tools
 * Knowledge of the English language at a professional level
   
   

Preferred skills:


 * Education or experience in rotorcraft flight testing
 * Aircraft MRO experience
 * Experience as an MRB/Liaison Engineer, or as a Flight Test Analysis Engineer/FTSE
   
   

Additional Information

OurVolocopterflight includes:


 * Fast-growing high-tech company with a superb network of investors and partners 
 * Chance to shape the future of aviation
 * Help us to create groundbreaking new projects - from scratch! 
 * Personal accountability, as well as growth and learning opportunities, based on your personal strengths
 * An inspiring workplace with modern workspaces, flexible hours, quick decision-making, a flat hierarchy, positive leadership, great team spirit
 * Attractive compensation package
   
   

Diversity atVolocopter:

Our differences are what make us great.Here at Volocopter, we value equal opportunities and trust. As air mobility industry innovators, we believe that changing the world starts on team level.We are committed to fosteringanenvironment where everyone feels valued, respected, and empoweredtoreach their full potential.

Dieses Wissen bietet unseren Kund:innen echten Mehrwert. Du bist das Bindeglied zwischen IT und Business. Du konzipierst. Du realisierst. Du treibst voran.

Qualifikation

Es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass jede:r Kandidat:in all diese Anforderungen erfüllt. Wenn Deine Erfahrungen anders sind und Du glaubst, dass Du einen Mehrwert für die Position bieten kannst, lass uns gerne darüber sprechen!

Benefits

Wir bieten Dir eine Kultur, die von unseren Führungsleitsätzen angetrieben wird: unternehmerisch, ergebnisorientiert, Eigenverantwortung fördernd und sich gegenseitig zum Erfolg verhelfend. Wir schaffen Transparenz über Unternehmensziele, Zusammenarbeit und Unterstützung durch ein internationales Team auf Augenhöhe. Wir leben Austausch, Teamgeist und einen respektvollen Umgang miteinander. Das verbindet uns hierarchieübergreifend – auch im Home-Office. So erhielten wir in 2022 die kununu Auszeichnung „TOP Company“.

Das erwartet Dich bei uns:


 * Onboarding: Du bist ab dem ersten Tag intern vernetzt: Welcome Day, Hello Drink, Mentoring-Programm
 * Entwicklung: Entwicklung ist bei uns individuell auf Deine Stärken ausgerichtet: Regelmäßige Feedbackgespräche, Karrierepfade, Career Committees, Online Trainingskatalog, Internationales Arbeiten mit unterschiedlichen Kulturen
 * Work-Life Balance: Raum für Deine persönliche Lebensplanung (Sabbatical, Remote Working aus dem Ausland, hochflexible Arbeitsmodelle, Elternzeitprogramme, 30 Tage Urlaub, Feiertagskalender Baden-Württemberg)
 * Nachhaltigkeit: Uns ist es wichtig, dass unsere Arbeit einen positiven Einfluss auf die Umwelt und die Menschheit hat. Dafür machen wir unsere Lösungen und unsere Zusammenarbeit jeden Tag ein Stückchen nachhaltiger.
 * Events: Fachlich und mit Spaßfaktor (Summer-Tech-Event, lokale Afterworks, Sportevents, Teamevents, Weihnachtsfeiern)
 * Netzwerken: Connecte Dich mit Deinen Kolleg:innen: Communities, Lunch Breaks, interne Know-How Sessions
 * Fehlerkultur: Mache Fehler und teste Dich aus: Wir geben Dir den Freiraum neuesten Technologien zu arbeiten
 * Prämien: Eine Vielzahl an Prämien für Dein zusätzliches Engagement
 * Weitere Vorteile: Corporate Benefits, Jobfahrrad, betriebliches Gesundheitsmanagement
   
   
   

Bei uns schließt Du dich einem dynamischen, erfahrenen Team von anderen engagierten und leidenschaftlichen Data und Analytics Spezialist:innen an. Wir wollen immer an unsere Grenzen gehen, um gemeinsam, als Positive Thinking Company, die besten Lösungen zu entwickeln.

Täglich arbeitest Du mit inspirierenden Kolleg:innen aus unseren vielfältigen Domains zusammen. Dabei arbeitest Du mit Persönlichkeiten wie Bereichsleiter:innen, Projektmanager:innen, Product Owner:innen, Entwickler:innen, Business Analysten und dem Vertrieb zusammen. Unsere Community ist divers: Wir bringen unterschiedliche Backgrounds mit und bündeln unsere kreativen Ideen und Fähigkeiten, um voneinander zu lernen.

Von Anfang an wirst Du in eine Kultur eintauchen, die geprägt ist von Kreativität, Spaß und Zusammenarbeit. Wir lernen aus Fehlern, um unsere Innovationskraft zu beflügeln.

title: Software QA Engineer at Elgato (m/f/d)
description:
Job Description

We are looking for a Stream Deck QA Engineer who is passionate about high quality software products.

In this role you will increase the quality of our successful Stream Deck and continuously strive to improve the testing and QA process.

What You’ll Be Working On

You will join our QA Team as QA Test Engineer for our Stream Deck Ecosystem, to partner up with the development teams. In this role you will be responsible to develop a test strategy for the products in cooperation with the development team and based on this strategy drive test design and implementation and execution.

You key responsibilities: ...


 * Testing and Quality Assurance:
    * Conduct comprehensive System and Integration testing of Stream Deck,
    * Validation of the Stream Deck NodeJS SDK
    * Support the testing of selected Stream Deck plugins.
    * Develop, execute, and maintain test cases, test plans, and test scripts.
    * Identify, document, and track bugs and issues, collaborating with the development team to resolve them.
    * Perform regression testing, functional testing, integration testing, and system testing.
    * Delegate test runs to dedicated test teams
    * Provide initial triage of bug escalations, ensuring all information is available for engineers, and steps-to-reproduce are accurate.

 * Test Automation:
    * Collaborate with the test automation team to drive test automation within the project.
    * Setup KPIs to track product health with test automation
    * Review and verify test automation results

 * Collaboration and Communication:
    * Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality software.
    * Provide clear and concise test reports and feedback to the development team.

 * Process Improvement:
    * Continuously seek opportunities to enhance testing processes and methodologies.
    * Implement and advocate for best practices in software testing and quality assurance.
      

What We’re Looking For


 * Education and Experience:
    * min. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
    * Proven experience as a Software Test Engineer or similar role, with a focus on desktop software.
    * Strong experience in test automation using Python frameworks.
    * Fluency in both written and spoken English;
    * Beneficial for this role is German

 * Technical Skills:
    * Proficiency in programming languages such as Typescript, JavaScript, Python.
    * Familiarity with Node.js
    * Experience with CI/CD tools like GitLab CI, GitHub Actions
    * Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.

 * Soft Skills:
    * Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
    * Strong communication and teamwork abilities.
    * Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality software.

 * Preferred Qualifications:
    * Experience with Stream Deck hardware and related software.
    * Knowledge of Docker and containerization technologies.
    * Understanding of the Software Development Lifecycle
    * ISTQB Foundation Level certification or similar
    * Passion for high quality products
      

About Us

WHAT YOU WILL GET


 * Competitive compensation
 * A leadership team that cares about what success looks like for you and works with you to map out your career development and growth
 * Enjoy the freedom to express your creativity
 * Work in a team of positive, passionate, and capable peers who love to work hard and play hard together
 * International Team in Munich, California, and around the globe
 * Opportunity to flex your creativity in a booming, future-proof industry
 * Focus on personal development and training in any relevant discipline
 * Modern and comfortable offices in the center of Munich
 * Quarterly profit share bonus and discounts on Elgato, Corsair, Origin, and Scuf Gaming products
 * And of course: Great coffee and fresh orange juice on tap, fresh fruits, drinks, BBQ sessions on the terrace and/or catered team lunch on Fridays, and discounted lunch vouchers on other days.
   
   

Who We Are

Elgato is the audiovisual tech brand of choice among content creators on all platforms. If you’ve watched videos on YouTube or Twitch, chances are, our products helped make them shine. Our mission is to empower content creators everywhere. Be part of the team that makes this happen.

In 2018, Elgato was acquired by Corsair, a provider of high-performance PCs and peripherals. Over the last three decades Corsair has cemented its leadership position in its key markets and continues to grow rapidly. As a semi-autonomous division of Corsair, we have engineering offices in Germany and California, and distribute our products in over eighty countries around the globe.

Elgato’s award winning product range combines cutting edge technologies with industry leading industrial design and user experiences to deliver an unparalleled level of performance to customers. Our focus is always on simplicity and enabling the best possible workflow for content creators.

GOOD TO KNOW

We provide a welcoming and inclusive environment for all, regardless of origin, ethnicity, gender identity, or religion.

Convince us with your personality and skills. Together we will achieve great things.

title: Machine Learning Engineer - fintech
description:
Job Opportunity: Machine Learning Engineer – Fintech Innovator in Frankfurt

Salary: €45,000 - €75,000 per year (depending on experience)




Are you passionate about leveraging machine learning to revolutionize the financial industry? I’m currently working with one of Frankfurt’s most dynamic fintech companies, a client dedicated to transforming how individuals and businesses interact with their finances. They specialize in developing AI-driven solutions for real-time fraud prevention, personalized investment portfolios, and advanced risk assessment tools. By harnessing the power of big data and machine learning, they empower their clients to make smarter financial decisions and achieve greater financial security.




About the Role:

As a Machine Learning Engineer, you’ll join a team of top-tier technologists and financial experts to design and deploy machine learning models that drive our client’s innovative solutions. Your work will directly impact products like fraud detection systems, personalized investment platforms, and advanced credit scoring algorithms.




What You’ll Do:

 * Develop, train, and optimize machine learning models for various financial applications.
 * Collaborate with data engineers to ensure seamless integration of ML pipelines.
 * Analyze large datasets to uncover insights that shape decision-making.
 * Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers and financial analysts, to align technical solutions with business goals.
 * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning, incorporating them into your work.




What We’re Looking For:

 * A Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD in Computer Science, Data Science, Machine Learning, or a related field from a quality university.
 * Ideally, 1-3 years of professional experience in machine learning, data science, or AI, though exceptional graduates are also encouraged to apply.
 * Proficiency in Python and machine learning libraries/frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn.
 * Expertise in handling and preprocessing large datasets with tools like Pandas, NumPy, and SQL.
 * Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) and deploying machine learning models in production environments.
 * Solid understanding of algorithms, statistics, and data modeling techniques.
 * Background in fintech or financial data is a bonus but not required.




Why Join?

Work at the forefront of fintech innovation in one of Europe’s leading financial hubs.




 * Flexible Work Environment: Hybrid work options to support a healthy work-life balance.
 * Professional Growth: Access to learning resources, certifications, and opportunities to attend industry-leading conferences.
 * Cutting-Edge Projects: Work on innovative AI and machine learning solutions that directly shape the future of financial technology.
 * Collaborative Culture: Join a diverse, supportive team of experts who value creativity, transparency, and teamwork.
 * Health & Wellness Support: Comprehensive health insurance coverage, gym memberships, and wellness programs.
 * Retirement Plans: Attractive pension contributions to secure your financial future.

 * State-of-the-Art Tools: Access to the latest software, hardware, and resources to excel in your role.
 * Employee Stock Options: Participate in the company’s success with equity opportunities.
 * If you’re ready to take your machine learning expertise to the next level and work on meaningful projects in the fintech space, I’d love to hear from you!

Different Mind steht für leidenschaftliches Gespür nach guten Fachkräften.




Durch starke Spezialisierung und langjährige Erfahrung schaffen wir es auch jetzt, qualifiziertes Personal zu finden. Ihre Aufgabe gehen wir mit Hingabe und Kompetenz an. Wichtig ist die für Sie passende Lösung, denn Sie brauchen Experten zur richtigen Zeit am richtigen Ort.




Daher unser Ansatz: Beraten. Vernetzen. Lösen.

Gemeinsam verbinden wir Experten.




Deine zukünftige Aufgaben

 * Überprüfung von Vorschriften und Spezifikationen, die vom Kunden hinsichtlich qualitätsrelevanter Inhalte bereitgestellt werden
 * Erstellung bzw. Überprüfung qualitätsbezogener Fertigungs- und Montageanweisungen sowie Arbeitsanweisungen, einschließlich Produktions- und Prüfablaufplänen, unter Berücksichtigung der geltenden Kundenvorschriften/-spezifikationen
 * Überprüfung der Werkstoffprüfspezifikationen für Zusatzwerkstoffe in enger Zusammenarbeit mit dem zuständigen Schweißfachingenieur
 * Vorbereitung von Endabnahmen von Rohrleitungsteilen
 * Unterstützung des Qualitätsprojektleiters und des Schweißfachingenieurs




Du bringst mit

 * Mindestens drei Jahre nachweisbare Erfahrung in Rohrleitungstechnologien (austenitische und ferritische Materialien), vorzugsweise in der Kerntechnik
 * Idealerweise Kenntnisse von Kerntechnik-Normen, vorzugsweise RCC-M Code
 * Nachweisbare Erfahrung in der Erstellung von Vorprüfunterlagen wie Prüfplänen, qualitätsbezogenen Verfahren und Ablaufplänen
 * Kenntnisse über gängige Prozesse in der Vorfertigung oder Montage von Rohrleitungen
 * Erfahrung im Umgang mit Prüforganisationen (z. B. TÜV, APAVE etc.)
 * Abgeschlossenes Studium der Werkstoffwissenschaften, Physik, Maschinenbau oder ähnlicher Fachrichtungen. Bei umfangreicher, nachgewiesener Berufserfahrung können auch Techniker, Meister oder Ähnliches in Betracht gezogen werden
 * Zertifizierung als Schweißfachingenieur/-techniker/-spezialist (EWF/IIW) von Vorteil
 * Zertifikate (DIN EN ISO 9712) für zerstörungsfreie Prüfungen wie VT, RT, PT, MT und visuelle Inspektionen sind von Vorteil
 * Sehr gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift
 * Gute MS-Office-Kenntnisse, insbesondere MS Word
 * PKW-Führerschein
 * Hohe Verantwortungsbereitschaft, Teamfähigkeit, Kommunikationsstärke, Durchsetzungsvermögen sowie eine engagierte, zuverlässige und eigenständige Arbeitsweise




Wir bieten dir

 * Spannende und abwechslungsreiche Aufgaben in einem dynamischen Umfeld.
 * Umfangreiche Möglichkeiten zur persönlichen und beruflichen Weiterentwicklung.
 * Ein motiviertes und kollegiales Team, das gemeinsam Erfolge feiert.
 * Ein modernes und flexibles Arbeitsumfeld mit der Möglichkeit, eigenverantwortlich zu arbeiten




Wenn Du Dich in dieser Beschreibung wiederfindest und Teil unseres erfolgreichen Teams werden möchtest, freuen wir uns auf Deine aussagekräftige Bewerbung. Bitte sende uns Deine Unterlagen, inklusive Gehaltsvorstellungen und frühestmöglichem Eintrittstermin, an mps@differentmind.de oder nutze unser Online-Bewerbungsformular.
